title: Muffler's Mayhem
description: I lost her once, and I'll be damned if I lose her again.MufflerBeretta and I had a relationship many years ago, only, we were the only two who knew about it. Now she's been in an accident and is suffering from amnesia. The doctors tell us her memories will come back with time, but to go along with what she thinks. Only, she thinks it's the time period when we're still together.We were the only two who knew about it, and now it's been outed to the entire club. Beretta and I went through some horrible shit back in the day, and we parted ways. Only, now I know I was a fool for walking away from her. I was a fool for giving up on her, and I'm viewing this as a second chance. But, what will happen when her memories come back? Will she be the one leaving me, or will she view this as a second chance like I do?
author: Elizabeth   Knox
